definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Please type or write in black to complete this two-page application form in English.
sentences.chinese: 请用英文缮打或以黑色正楷书写完成此兩页之申请表。

sentences.english: Please complete this declaration in BLOCK letters using black or blue pen.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色或蓝色笔以正楷填写本声明书。

sentences.english: For handwriting, please complete every item in block letters and in black or blue ink.
sentences.chinese: 如手写请用黑色或深蓝色原子笔，以正楷填写本表格。

sentences.english: Please complete every item in block letters and in black ink.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水笔或原子笔，以正楷填写各项。

sentences.english: Write your name in block letters.
sentences.chinese: 请用正楷大写字母写你的名字。

sentences.english: They were told to write their names in block letters.
sentences.chinese: 他们被告知要用正楷大写书写姓名。

sentences.english: For easy record, please complete the form in BLOCK LETTERS.
Please complete this form in BLOCK letters using black or blue pen.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色或藍色笔以正楷填写本表格。

sentences.english: Please complete this information sheet in BLOCK letters using black or blue pen.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色或蓝色笔以正楷填写本资料表。

sentences.english: Please complete the form either in English or Chinese, and print it in BLOCK LETTERS.
sentences.chinese: 请以英文大写或中文正楷字体填写本表格。

sentences.english: To facilitate processing, please fill in block letters.
sentences.chinese: 为方便电脑处理，请以英文正楷填写。

sentences.english: To avoid any typing mistake when preparing the badge, please TYPE or write in BLOCK LETTER.
sentences.chinese: 为避免错漏，请清楚打印或以正楷填写。

sentences.english: On the delivery, receiver is asked to sign the waybill with regular script.
sentences.chinese: 收件人签收邮件时亦应使用正楷签名。

sentences.english: Please fill in this form legibly to facilitate the data input process.
sentences.chinese: 请用英文正楷填写此表格以便输入资料。

sentences.english: Please complete this form in BLOCK LETTERS and read all the following terms.
sentences.chinese: 请用英文正楷填写此表格及详阅以下条款。

sentences.english: All sections of this application form should be completed in block letters .
sentences.chinese: 本申请表的所有部分均应以正楷填写。

definition: the small or lesser seal, the form of Chinese character standardized by the Qin dynasty
